name: Esp32 Mining Cluster
description: A fun project to understand Blockchain and Bitcoin. A cluster of 3 esp32s with custom firmware to mine bitcoin on public-pool.io.

name: Bitcoin Price Tracker - Esp32
description: Custom circuit board with screen, sensors, and buttons to practice programs on esp32 microcontroller. Using Api to fetch bitcoin price.

name: Snake-Game and Pong-Game
description: Snake Game and Pong-Game made with Python Turtle

name: Tik-Tak-Toe Game
description: Tik-Tak-Toe Game made with Graphics library in Python
